name: Miniature Garden
description: Miniature Garden is a Japanese mystery visual novel with multiple endings and art by Korie Riko (Lump of Sugar).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 2.0GHz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 720p or higher display resolution DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
